descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#00ffff][size=5]Thank you for looking at my work！[/size][/color][/b]

This followers mod is standalone
[size=3][b]ruina can be found In New Gnisis Cornerclub　second floor of Wind helm
[/b][/size]
[b][size=3]minas can be found In Candlehearth Hall　one floor kitchen of Wind helm[/size][/b]
The gilrs is body type is UNP, and her essential

ruina is good at unarmed

minas is good at summon gargoyle and one handed weapon

The options file is Minas vanilla version

[color=#00ffff]You can use the SSLXLTN file if you have a Japanese version[/color]


[Cast cooperation]
nord male(Author)

[size=4][STATUS][/size]
[b][size=3]ruina

[/size][/b]race: Dunmer
combat style: only Unarmed
Marriage possible
[spell]
fighting soul(Unarmed Damage & Fire Cloak)
*she has the spell book

[perk]
Juggernaut20
Fists of Steel
Reflect Blows
Tower of Strengthaaa
Agile Defender20
Deft Movement
Light Foot
Muffled Movement

[size=4]minas

[/size]race: Altmer
combat style: summon gargoyle. onehandedweapon. vampire drain
Marriage possible
[perk]
Agile Defender40
Stealth40
LightFoot
Silence
Armsman20

[spell]
Ability of the vampire
summon gargoyle(vanilla does not exist in version)
